remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 `src`从 `srcOffset`开始将 `count` 字节从复制到 `dst`，从 `dstOffset`开始。This method copies `count` bytes from `src`, beginning at `srcOffset`, to `dst`, beginning at `dstOffset`. `srcOffset` 和 `dstOffset` 都是从零开始的;也就是说，每个缓冲区中的第一个字节的位置为0，而不是位置1。Both `srcOffset` and `dstOffset` are zero-based; that is, the first byte in each buffer is at position 0, not position 1. 方法将使用偏移量访问 `src` 参数数组中的字节，而不是使用索引或数组下限等编程构造。The method accesses the bytes in the `src` parameter array using offsets into memory, not programming constructs such as indexes or upper and lower array bounds. 例如，如果使用应用程序的编程语言，则可以声明一个 数组，其50下限为从零开始，然后将该数组和偏移量5传递到 方法，该方法将访问的第一个数组元素是数组的第二个元素，该元素位于索引-49。For example, if in the programming language of your application you declare an array with a zero-based lower bound of -50, and then pass the array and an offset of 5 to the method, the first array element the method will access is the second element of the array, which is at index -49. 此外，首先访问数组元素49的哪个字节取决于正在执行应用程序的计算机的字节排序。Furthermore, which byte of array element -49 is accessed first depends on the endianness of the computer that is executing your application. 顾名思义， 方法将字节块作为一个整体复制，而不是一次复制一个字节。As its name suggests, the method copies a block of bytes as a whole, rather than copying one byte at a time. 因此，如果 `src` 和 `dst` 引用相同的数组，`srcOffset` + 中的范围 `count` `dstOffset` + -1，则在将重叠字节的值复制到目标之前，不会覆盖这些值。`count`Therefore, if `src` and `dst` reference the same array, and the range from `srcOffset` + `count` -1 overlaps the range from `dstOffset` + `count` - 1, the values of the overlapping bytes are not overwritten before they are copied to the destination. 在下面的示例中，名为 `arr` 的数组中字节0-16 的值将复制到字节12-28。In the following example, the values of bytes 0-16 in an array named `arr` are copied to bytes 12-28. 尽管存在重叠的范围，但源字节的值已成功复制。Despite the overlapping range, the values of the source bytes are successfully copied. [!code-cpp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CPP/overlap1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CS/overlap1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/VB/overlap1.vb#3)] 在下面的示例中，名为 `arr` 的数组中字节12-28 的值将复制到字节0-16。In the following example, the values of bytes 12-28 in an array named `arr` are copied to bytes 0-16. 同样，无论重叠范围如何，都可以成功复制源字节的值。Again, despite the overlapping range, the values of the source bytes are successfully copied. [!code-cpp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CPP/overlap1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/CS/overlap1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Buffer.BlockCopy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Buffer.BlockCopy/VB/overlap1.vb#4)] ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法复制数组区域。The following example copies regions of arrays by using the method. 对于每个 操作，它将源数组和目标数组同时作为值数组和字节序列列出。For each operation, it lists the source and destination arrays as both an array of values and as a sequence of bytes. 该示例说明了在使用 方法时考虑系统的字节排序的重要性：由于 Windows 系统不是字节序，因此基元数据类型值的低序位字节优先于高阶字节。The example illustrates the importance of considering a system's endianness when working with the method: Because Windows systems are little-endian, the lower-order bytes of a primitive data type's value precede the higher-order bytes.
